text: usane kaha, "main use tumhaare saath kadaapi nahin bhej sakata. jab tak ki tum allaah ko gavaah banaakar mujhe pakka vachan na do ki tum use mere paas avashy laoge, yah aur baat hai ki tum ghir jao." phir jab unhonne use apana vachan de diya to usane kaha, "ham jo kuchh kar rahe hai vah allaah ke havaale hai.
